alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 6:56AM EST until January 30 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Northeast Aroostook County. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and cause localized hazardous travel.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means blowing snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
